meta.keywords: bounce, bounce finance, finance, DeFi, bot
meta.description: Bounce powers an ecosystem of products for auctions. Build, design, connect, collect and trade all kinds of assets, tokens and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

og.title: Bounce
og.description: Bounce powers an ecosystem of products for auctions. Build, design, connect, collect and trade all kinds of assets, tokens and NFTs across multiple blockchains.

banner.title: Auction as a Service
banner.text: From customized auction pools to seamless on-chain settlements, Bounce Finance provides the tools you need to unleash the full potential of decentralized auctions.

build-with-bounce.title: Build with Bounce
build-with-bounce.description: Unlock the potential of Auction Finance
build-with-bounce.detail: Bounce provides a full suite of decentralized auction tools: Our signature decentralized auction platform, SDK infrastructure for Auctions, and our NFT auctions. Build and participate in decentralized auctions with our infrastructure of trustless applications, tools and solutions.

companyList.title: Follow & Invest in Web3's most innovative companies

list.item1-text: In building a platform designed to serve the masses, we've designed a system that utilizes both centralized and decentralized technology. By doing so, users can access our platform via Web2 credentials, like email & social media, and enjoy the benefits of decentralization & distributed ledgers only while using our web3 products.
list.item2-text: Utilize Bounce's wide range of smart contract solutions to fit your own unique needs; build your decentralized application with flexibility and interoperability.
list.item3-text1: Each Bounce user will receive a unique QR code which will be automatically assigned to their profile on Bounce.
list.item3-text2: Scan the digital code to get started and explore a your network of Web3 friends!

bounce-labs.title: Bounce Labs:
bounce-labs.description: Incubating the Future of Decentralized Innovation
bounce-labs.detail: Bounce Labs incubates a wide range of Web3 native startups, each with the aim of innovating concepts and ideas beyond the existing ecosystem of Bounce applications. Check out our initiatives and build with us today!

eimi-fukada.name: Eimi Fukada
eimi-fukada.text: Eimi Fukada is a Japanese Adult Video actress since 2017. In 2020, she was the third ranked AV actress by sales.

kyle-kuzma.name: Kyle Kuzma
kyle-kuzma.text: Kyle Kuzma is an American professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers of the NBA.

nick-young.name: Nick Young
nick-young.text: Nick "Swaggy P" Young is a former professional basketball player of the NBA from Los Angeles, California.

skyy-clark.name: Skyy Clark
skyy-clark.text: Skyy Clark is a 5-star High School basketball player from Los Angeles, CA.

asap-rocky.name: A$AP Rocky
asap-rocky.text: A$AP Rocky is a rapper, singer, songwriter, and actor from New York City.

deandre-hopkins.name: DeAndre Hopkins
deandre-hopkins.text: DeAndre "Nuk" Hopkins is an American football wide receiver for the Arizona Cardinals of the NFL.

devon-dotson.name: Devon Dotson
devon-dotson.text: Devon Dotson is a 21 year old professional basketball player for the Chicago Bulls of the NBA.

banner.title: Auction
banner.text: Launch and Finance Web3 Investment with Bounce’s Comprehensive set of Auction Tools

card1.title: Investors
card1.paragraph1: Browse a wide range of auction offerings with Bounce auction, including: Token auctions and NFT auctions.
card1.paragraph2: Stay up to date on the latest auction information and opportunities with Bounce's open directory of prominent Web3 company information.

card2.title: Founders and Companies
card2.paragraph1: Plug and play tools to support your unique auction strategies.
card2.paragraph2: Customizable auction applications catered to fit your company's individual demands.

banner.tips1: * Bounce only provides tools for investment and does not host any investment activities for any party.
banner.tips2: Certain investment activties are restricted in certain countries

banner.title: Talent for employers
banner.description: Hire talent to help build your vision
banner.detail: With over 8 million motivated, "startup-ready" job seekers from around the world and all the tools and details you need to hire.

banner.title: Jobs for talents
banner.description: Matching top talent with top companies
banner.detail: With over 8 million motivated, "startup-ready" job seekers from around the world and all the tools and details you need to hire.

banner.title: Company
banner.description: Infrastructure to support your Web3 vision
banner.detail: Our mission is to inspire a new generation of investors and founders by providing them with everything they need to launch and scale a fund or startup

card1.title: Jobs Market
card1.paragraph: We believe anyone with a passion for innovation should be able to invest in world-changing startups.

card2.title: Decentralized app toolbox
card2.paragraph: Utilize Bounce's wide range of smart contract solutions to fit your own unique needs; build your decentralized application with flexibility and interoperability.

card3.title: QR code and digital card
card3.paragraph: Each Bounce user will receive a unique QR code which will be automatically assigned to their profile on Bounce. Scan the digital code to get started and explore a your network of Web3 friends!

jobs-market.title: Jobs Market
jobs-market.description: Bounce's tools streamline the investing process for all angels and VCs, whether they're founding and scaling a newer fund or investing alongside established managers.

digital-card.title: Share your QR code and digital card
digital-card.description: Network digitally using our QR powered business cards- the future of commerce is here!
digital-card.item1: Increase engagement and establish a unique connection with potential employers/employees by using  QR powered business cards- stand out and be remembered!
digital-card.item2: Helps you generate stunningprofile pages for business cards. Makes it very easy for others to follow you and know you better.
digital-card.item3: Timezones - you can filter by timezones and see exactly how many hours ahead or behind a candidate is
digital-card.item4: Create your own perfect social media landing page and convert your offline visitors into fans and followers.

toolbox.title: Decentralized application toolbox
toolbox.description: Find different types of investment offerings from auction, otc, to merger and acquisition through our platform.

banner.title: $AUCTION
banner.description: AUCTION powers Bounce's entire ecosystem of decentralized applications with a wide range of utility, including: governance, staking, in-app marketplace/auction currency, and rewards for holders.

card1.title: Governance
card1.paragraph: A fully decentralized and community governed protocol, Bounce is governed exclusively by AUCTION token holders.

card2.title: Dynamic Staking
card2.paragraph: AUCTION can be staked to passively earn rewards and yield generated by the Bounce ecosystem of products.

card3.title: Premium Account
card3.paragraph: Bounce Token holders are able to unlock additional benefits of Bounce V3 with premium account permissions.

card4.title: Bounce Marketplace
card4.paragraph: Spend your AUCTION at a variety of different Bounce Marketplaces; from hiring & paying talent purchasing in-game items within the Bounce Metaverse!

chains.title:
Play across
chains
chains.text: Bounce products are available across multiple blockchains for more play, more possibility, more potential.

participation.text: An evolving ecosystem of products that allows all kinds of people to participate in decentralized auctions.
participation.item2: Run projects through crowdloans or trade in scarce digital assets
participation.item3: Have a share in the creator economy

bounce-auction.title: Unlock the potential of open finance
bounce-auction.text: Trade scarce digital assets in a competitive swap environment on our versatile, decentralized and trustless auction platform.
bounce-auction.item1: Choose from an array of auction types, including: Fixed swap, Sealed-bid, Dutch and English auction.
bounce-auction.item3: Benefit from automatic execution, contingency, permission-less.

fangible.title: NFT Marketplace. The biggest stars. Their rarest work. Directly accessible to fans.
fangible.text: A new kind of fan experience, Fangible makes it easy to step in and own a share of the creator economy. It connects artists to their fans and lets anyone join the NFT conversation.

bounce-polkadot.title: Matching digital freelance supply and demand
bounce-polkadot.text: We believe that, in addition to traditional forms of linking NFTs such as traditional paintings and electronic posters, any customized, non-standard delivery, and electronically delivered works can be linked to the world of NFTs. Using NFTs as delivery credentials and the immutable record function of the blockchain decentralized network, the author, buyer, transaction time, and work URL will be permanently traced and recorded.

bounce-toolbox.title: Everything you need to build to build your own decentralized auction platform.
bounce-toolbox.text: An extensive set of developer tools that make harnessing the power of  decentralized auctions easier than it’s ever been. UI kits, API access to Bounce NFTs, open source smart contracts. Everything you need to bring DeFi to the masses.

binance-exchange.title: Binance  Exchange
binance-exchange.text: As one of the first projects to enter the Binance ecosystem, Bounce became the cornerstone of the Binance ecosystem, including furthering its role as a mentor for BNB Chain’s Most Valuable Builder program.

bounce-metaverse.title: Bounce Finance & Cybever
bounce-metaverse.text: In an effort to onboard more users into the Bounce ecosystem, we have worked to develop Bounce’s “Metaverse City”. In our eyes, Bounce’s Metaverse will be the centerpiece of our future, a virtual homebase that will bridge each of our products together for a seamless, immersive experience.
bounce-metaverse.metaverse-city-info: Having the entire Bounce ecosystem housed within one virtual world gives our users the opportunity to explore all the tools Bounce has to offer with the best user experience. When this “merge” (if you will) is complete, we will have built the first “full suite” of interconnected Web3 projects providing utility for all different users in the crypto space. Some features of Metaverse City include: “Workshops”, “Playground”, “Gallery”, “Games”and a “Mall”.

auction-block.title: Bounce Auction
auction-block.subtitle:
Launch and participate in permission-less finance with Bounce's renowned
Decentralized Auction Platform.

auction-type.title: Bounce offers a comprehensive suite of popular Auction types, including:

bounce-otc.title: Auction SDK and PlugIn
bounce-otc.subtitle: Bounce provides an SDK and Plugin to create and host auctions online, bringing together everything needed to build an auction. You can host your own auctions on your website.

bounce-M&A.title: Bounce Developers
bounce-M&A.subtitle: Ship more quickly with powerful and easy-to-use APIs

featureList.info1: Project particle supports a variety of tokens from ERC20 to NFTs
featureList.info2: Design your chemistry to meet your needs with customizable parameters & a variety of input & output options
featureList.info3: New tokens will be issued reflexively following our consolidation process meaning you will not have to issue your own new tokens
featureList.info4: Anyone can initiate a chemistry at any time

bounce-NFT.title: Bounce NFT
bounce-NFT.subtitle: Bounce NFT enables users to not only buy, sell and manage NFTs with our marketplace, but also to launch and create their own NFT projects by using our launchpad.

job-tools.title: The tools and resources you need to hire, all in one place
job-tools.subtitle: Get started hiring in under 10 minutes

person-list.info1: - we'll let you know if a candidate is open to work offers and/or is ready to interview
person-list.info2: - we give candidates the ability to showcase this in unique ways, like detailing their biggest accomplishment and more!
person-list.info3: - you can filter by timezones and see exactly how many hours ahead or behind a candidate is
person-list.info4: - search for candidates who are open to remote or in person work, explore the type of work environment they prefer
person-list.info5: - view the related company profile to help you evaluate candidates’ skills further

crypto-currencies.title: Buy Crypto with Fiat Currencies
crypto-currencies.subtitle: Simply choose the crypto you want to buy, network, and amount you wish to purchase.
crypto-currencies.subtitle2: Bounce will compare providers and offer you the best rate.
